attributes.action: Rescind the deportation order against Watford Football Club player, Al Bangura
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recent decision to deport the Watford Football Club player, Al Bangura, to his country of birth Sierra Leone, goes against all forms of natural justice. Firstly the case to deport him is undermined by strong evidence that his life would be endangered on return by his native tribe. Secondly, in a time in which the country is actively seeking to deport 'undesirables', a young family man who plays professional football, bringing joy to many thousands, pays his taxes and is a valuable contributor to the local economy can hardly be considered as such unless other agendas are at work.
Sign this petition now.

rejection.details: Individual cases are a matter for direct correspondence with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
